name: EX Rainbow Packs
packContents: Same contents as T4 packs + chance at exclusive SPs
description: Loose packs only — not available in booster boxes. Sold via Kayou official store in China. 100 packs per case, 12 cases per master case.
notes: SP009 EXCLUSIVE — one of the most expensive cards in all KAYOU. SLR pullable. EX4+5 have SE cards. Highest hit rate of any KAYOU product.
